GitHub Twitter PhilPeople

I am about to start an MRes/PhD in the Department of Government at the London School of Economics. My plan is to work somewhere between political philosophy and social epistemology.

I completed my MSc in the Philosophy of the Social Sciences at the LSE in the Department of Philosophy, Logic, and Scientific Method. Before that, I completed my BA in Philosophy and Economics at Cardiff University.

In between my studies, I worked in the government economic service in a few roles including international climate finance and local policy analysis.

This website was built with Quarto, GitHub, and deployed with Netlify. License: CC BY-SA 2.0.
